feed.title: PortChecker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [api] Bump pytest from 8.3.3 to 8.3.4 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/286
  • [web] Bump prettier from 3.3.3 to 3.4.2 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/295
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.15.0 to 9.19.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/299
  • [web] Bump webpack-dev-server from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/294
  • [web] Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/289
  • [api] Bump pydantic from 2.10.1 to 2.10.6 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/298
  • [api] Bump pylint from 3.3.1 to 3.3.4 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/297
  • [api] Bump uvicorn from 0.32.1 to 0.34.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/291
  • [api] Bump tomli from 2.1.0 to 2.2.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/288
  • Update image path for Ko-Fi by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/302
  • Allow API service hostname to be defined by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/303
  • Correct documentation for API_URL environment variable" by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.2.0...v3.2.1

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add some more YouTube mentions by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/305
  • Add missing changelog entry for v3.2.1 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/313
  • Allow hyphenated subdomains in the UI by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/314
  • [web] Bump @eslint/js from 9.19.0 to 9.21.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/306
  • [api] Bump isort from 5.13.2 to 6.0.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/312
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.19.0 to 9.21.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/310
  • [web] Bump globals from 15.12.0 to 16.0.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/307
  • [web] Bump webpack from 5.96.1 to 5.98.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/308
  • [web] Bump copy-webpack-plugin from 12.0.2 to 13.0.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/309
  • [api] Bump litestar from 2.13.0 to 2.15.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/311
  • Add Prometheus metrics endpoint by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/315
  • Add better Grafana dashboard screenshot by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/316
  • Improve Grafana dashboard by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/317
  • Add datasource dropdown for Grafana dashboard by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/318
  • Bump release v3.2.2 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.2.1...v3.2.2

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [web] Bump @eslint/js from 9.21.0 to 9.23.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/323
  • [web] Bump css-minimizer-webpack-plugin from 7.0.0 to 7.0.2 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/321
  • [web] Bump webpack-cli from 5.1.4 to 6.0.1 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/322
  • [web] Bump prettier from 3.4.2 to 3.5.3 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/324
  • [web] Bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.7 to 2.0.9 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/328
  • [api] Bump pylint from 3.3.5 to 3.3.6 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/325
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.21.0 to 9.23.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/320
  • [api] Bump pytest-cov from 6.0.0 to 6.1.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/326
  • [api] Bump pydantic from 2.10.6 to 2.11.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/327

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.2.2...v3.2.3

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [api] Bump h11 from 0.14.0 to 0.16.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/329
  • [web] Bump webpack from 5.98.0 to 5.99.7 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/330
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.25.0 to 9.25.1 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/331
  • [web] Bump webpack-dev-server from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/332
  • [web] Bump @eslint/js from 9.25.0 to 9.25.1 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/333
  • [api] Bump litestar from 2.15.1 to 2.15.2 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/334
  • [api] Bump uvicorn from 0.34.0 to 0.34.2 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/335
  • [api] Bump pydantic from 2.11.3 to 2.11.4 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/336
  • Allow default host to be defined by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/338
  • Prepare for 3.3.0 release by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.2.3...v3.3.0

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve test coverage by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/354
  • [api] Bump pylint from 3.3.6 to 3.3.7 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/346
  • [web] Bump @eslint/js from 9.27.0 to 9.30.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/349
  • [api] Bump pytest-mock from 3.14.0 to 3.14.1 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/345
  • [web] Bump prettier from 3.5.3 to 3.6.2 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/353
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.25.1 to 9.30.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/352
  • [web] Bump webpack from 5.99.7 to 5.99.9 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/343
  • [web] Bump globals from 16.0.0 to 16.3.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/351
  • [api] Bump litestar from 2.15.2 to 2.16.0 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/347
  • [api] Bump uvicorn from 0.34.2 to 0.35.0 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/348
  • [api] Bump pydantic from 2.11.5 to 2.11.7 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/350
  • Fix issue where localhost would resolve to ipv6 for healthcheck by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/362
  • [web] Bump eslint from 9.30.1 to 9.32.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/356
  • [api] Bump pytest from 8.3.5 to 8.4.1 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/360
  • [api] Bump pytest-cov from 6.1.1 to 6.2.1 in /backend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/361
  • [web] Bump webpack from 5.99.9 to 5.101.0 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/359
  • [web] Bump webpack-dev-server from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 in /frontend/web by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/358
  • Prepare for 3.3.1 release by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/363

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.3.0...v3.3.1
